{{Infobox Berry |name = #02 Chesto |image = [[File:Chesto.png]] |caption = This Berry's thick skin and fruit are very tough and dry tasting. However, every bit of it can be eaten. |growtime = 40s |harvest = 3 berries |replant = 50% |points = 6 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Chesto''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]] to obtain [[Farming Points|Farm Points]]. It can be obtained as a random drop by defeating wild Pokémon on routes. {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 5 secs || 15 secs || 25 secs || 40 secs - 1 min 20 secs |- ! Animation |
